item.title: Hugo Static Site on GitHub - Customizations
item.description: While working on migrating this site from WordPress to Hugo, I did tweak somethings to make it work for my liking. I usually keep things simple so that future changes are as painless as possible, however, I decided to go ahead with these changes as it improved maintainability and reverting these changes are very straight forward. Hugo’s default publish directory Hugo generates the static site content in public directory by default.

item.title: From WordPress to A Static Site Generator
item.description: I have been telling myself that I will get back into blogging again and again in vain. I have a bunch of drafts that I have not posted; I keep thinking about posting them and posting my views about current affairs and daily life. For some reason I just can’t commit to it. I feel like I have hit this big writer’s block and I somehow don’t want to get out if it.
